alert.note: Alert for White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 12:40PM CDT until May 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WHITE...SOUTHWESTERN WABASH...SOUTHWESTERN GIBSON AND NORTHEASTERN POSEY COUNTIES... At 1239 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Poseyville, or 10 miles south of Mount Carmel, moving northeast at 25 mph. Another thunderstorm was intensifying a few miles north of New Harmony, also moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Owensville, Mount Carmel and Princeton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 17. Interstate 64 in Illinois near Mile Marker 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
